TEXT.TITLE: ROSS STORES <ROST>FEBRUARY SAME-STORE SALES FLAT
TEXT.BODY: Ross Stores Inc said sales for the four weeks ended February 28 were up 33 pct to 40 mln dlrs from 30 mln dlrs a year earlier, with same-store sales flat. Reuter
